#summary Try out pchart4mw

Once pchart4mw is installed you can try creating your first bar chart.

=== Edit a wiki page===
Open a page of your wiki site and edit this wikitext in it and save the page:
{{{
<pbars>
5345
3452
7843
</pbars>
}}}

=== Looks like===
The page should look something like:

http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-bar-00.png
